text: Kamaghɨn amizɨma, akar kam tintinibar arui, ezɨ gumazamiziba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨgha ghaze, “Suren gumazir kam an aremeghan kogham.” Ezɨ Iesus guizbangɨra kamaghɨn mɨkemezir puvatɨ, an aremeghan kogham. Puvatɨ. A ghaze, “Kɨ ifueghtɨ a ikɨvɨra ikɨ mangɨ dughiar kɨ uamategh izamim otogham, kar nɨn bizim pu.”
